name: cloyingly
content:
cloyingly adverb
(too emotional)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that seems good, kind, or loving but is too extreme, annoying, or not sincere: His impassioned outpourings can sometimes turn cloyingly sentimental. Despite its cloyingly cute title, this is a delightful, readable book.
More examplesFewer examplesHe smiled in a cloyingly possessive way.She was cloyingly loyal to the Prime Minister.He speaks cloyingly about America's obligation to its children and grandchildren.
